Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Establishes a real property tax exemption for surviving spouses of police officers killed in the line of duty
Summary: Establishes a real property tax exemption for the primary residences of surviving spouses of police officers killed in the line of duty.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing a real property tax exemption for surviving spouses of police officers killed in the line of duty
